title: Malware types encountered during data compromise investigations 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type Of Malware, and Share of encounters in each Type Of Malware on the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
The difference of Share of encounters between the highest and lowest Type Of Malware is 12.3.
